metatags.title: CineRitual AI Prompt Script
metatags.description: A structured prompt book for generating cinematic web assets.

skills.visual_anchoring: I am building a high-end cinematic website using the CineRitual framework for [BRAND]. Analyze the brand's luxury positioning and provide 3 primary HSL colors and 1 contrast accent. Recommend a pairing of Playfair Display and Inter for typography.
skills.media_generation: Generate a high-resolution, photorealistic cinematic background sequence for [TOPIC]. The lighting should be moody, with [COLOR] accents. Composition should be centered with ample negative space for text overlays. Resolution: 16:9.
skills.copywriting_ritual: Write a 'Cinematic' landing page copy for [BRAND]. We need: 1. An 'eyebrow' line (3 words max), 2. A 'hero headline' (intense and poetic), 3. A 'subtext' (sophisticated and mission-driven).
